channel.title: Text games discussion
channel.description:
if you play a text based game(something like mafia wars on myspace, or any of the other apps on myself, or games like Ogame, or mypimpscript)discuss it here.
my favorite text game is probably Ogame. or the one i have been developing for months.
whats yours :eek:?

item.title: Text games discussion
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

I used to play Tycoon online, which was quite a nice game but got too repetitive so I quit. And I played Hattrick too, but I got banned.

Read full topic

item.title: Text games discussion
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

There are a lot of good MUDs out there, and they’re generally a lot more in depth and fun than mmorpgs. For example, I spent several hours customizing my low level character’s armour and weaponry. Only to die and get my corpse raided two months later, and get so pissed off I quit for several months. I’ll go back to it eventually, but I’m bored of rpgs apart from Daggerfall at the moment.

Read full topic

item.title: Text games discussion
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

The only text game I really played was darkthrone, the problem was, while making a leet low level account was easy(and recruiting was fast with scar), I never bothered spending more than 2-3 weeks working on it before I got bored and quit for months.

Read full topic

item.title: Text games discussion
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I played Mafia Wars for a bit on MySpace, and I also play Farm Town on facebook due to the fact about 40 people I know play it also.

Read full topic

most of them do, i quit alot of them to

item.title: Text games discussion
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

I used to play Tribalwars, the .net, .no, .dk and .se version.

I quit the .se version pretty early, and later that year I quit all of them.
They started getting very time consuming and way too serious.

Read full topic
